item.title: Bose Recalls EdgeMax® and FreeSpace® Loudspeakers Due to Injury Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The loudspeaker’s mounting components can break causing the speakers to dislodge and fall from its installed location, posing an injury hazard.

item.title: Everbilt Door Pulls Recalled Due to Laceration Hazard; Sold Exclusively at Home Depot; Made by Wellsco International Group
item.description: The door pulls can have sharp edges on the back, posing a laceration hazard.

item.title: Custom Molded Products Recalls Valve Caps Sold With Hot Tubs/Swim Spas Due to Impact Hazard
item.description: The valve cap on the hot tubs and swim spas can become loose, pop off and strike a bystander, posing an impact hazard.

item.title: Swaddle Bee Recalls Children’s Security Blankets Due to Choking Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The blanket’s snaps can detach, posing a choking hazard.

item.title: Disney Recalls the Forky 11” Plush Toy Due to Choking Hazard
item.description: The “googly” plastic eyes on the toy can detach, posing a choking hazard to young children.

item.title: The Company Store Recalls Girl’s Pajama Sets Due to Violation of Federal Flammability Standard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The pajama sets fail to meet the federal flammability standard for children's sleepwear, posing a risk of burn injuries to children.

item.title: Just Love Fashion Recalls Children’s Pajama Pants Due to Violation of Federal Flammability Standard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The children’s pajama pants fail to meet the flammability standard for children’s sleepwear, posing a risk of burn injuries to children.

item.title: Nature’s Truth Recalls Wintergreen Essential Oil Due to Failure to Meet Child Resistant Closure Requirements
item.description: The bottles are not child resistant as required by the Poison Prevention Packaging Act, posing a poisoning risk if the contents are swallowed by young children.

item.title: SRAM Recalls RockShox Front Suspension Forks Due to Crash and Injury Hazards
item.description: The fork’s lower leg assembly can break and cause the rider to lose control, posing crash and injury hazards.

item.title: Electric Bicycles Recalled by Faraday; Seat Post Poses Fall Hazard
item.description: The seat post on the bicycles can break, posing a fall hazard to the rider.

item.title: Yamaha Recalls Grizzly ATVs and Wolverine X2 ROVs Due to Incorrect Owner’s Manual (Recall Alert)
item.description: Purchasers were given a defective owner’s manual which shows the correct model on the cover, but the contents are for another model.

item.title: Chandeliers Recalled by Dolan Northwest Due to Impact and Laceration Hazards
item.description: The top loop of the fixture can bend and break causing the chandelier to fall, posing an impact and laceration hazard to consumers.

item.title: BRP Recalls Coolers Due to Entrapment and Suffocation Hazards
item.description: The cooler latch can automatically lock when the lid is closed, allowing a person to become locked inside the air tight container posing entrapment and suffocation hazards.

item.title: Gillette Recalls Venus Simply3 Disposable Razors Due to Laceration and Injury Hazards
item.description: A problem during manufacturing resulted in the misalignment of the blades in the razors, posing a higher risk of cuts during normal use.

item.title: Apple Recalls 15-Inch MacBook Pro Laptop Computers Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The batteries in the recalled laptop computers can overheat, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Fisher-Price Recalls Inclined Sleeper Accessory Included with Ultra-Lite Day & Night Play Yards Due to Safety Concerns About Inclined Sleep Products
item.description: Infant fatalities have been reported while using other inclined sleep products, after the infants rolled from their back to their stomach or side while unrestrained, or under other circumstances.

item.title: Patriot Pyrotechnics/Bill’s Fireworks Recalls Fireworks Due to Violation of Federal Standards; Explosion and Burn Hazards; Sold Exclusively at Patriot Pyrotechnics
item.description: The recalled fireworks are overloaded with pyrotechnics intended to produce an audible effect, violating the federal regulatory standard for this product. Overloaded fireworks can result in a greater than expected explosion, posing explosion and burn hazards to consumers.

item.title: GS Fireworks Recalls Fireworks Due to Violation of Federal Standards; Explosion and Burn Hazards; Sold Exclusively at GS Fireworks
item.description: The recalled fireworks are overloaded with pyrotechnics intended to produce an audible effect, violating the federal regulatory standard for this product. Overloaded fireworks can result in a greater than expected explosion, posing explosion and burn hazards to consumers.

item.title: Grandma’s Fireworks Recalls Fireworks Due to Violation of Federal Standards; Explosion and Burn Hazards
item.description: The recalled fireworks are overloaded with pyrotechnics intended to produce an audible effect, violating the federal regulatory standard for this product. Overloaded fireworks can result in a greater than expected explosion, posing explosion and burn hazards to consumers.

item.title: Keystone Recalls G-Force Fireworks Due to Violation of Federal Standard; Explosion and Burn Hazards
item.description: The recalled fireworks are overloaded with pyrotechnics intended to produce an audible effect, violating the federal regulatory requirements for this product. Overloaded fireworks can result in a greater than expected explosion, posing explosion and burn hazards to consumers. The fireworks are banned hazardous substances and are prohibited from being sold under the Federal Hazardous Substances Act (FHSA).

item.title: QTOP USA Recalls LED Work Light Replacement Bulbs Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The LED replacement bulbs can overheat due to an electrical malfunction, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: West Marine Recalls Folding Deck Chairs Due to Fall and Injury Hazards
item.description: The lock nut that connects the arm rest to the chair can loosen, posing fall and injury hazards to the user.

item.title: Ranee’s Recalls Women’s Beach Cover-ups Due to Violation of Federal Flammability Standard
item.description: The women’s beach cover-up fails to meet the flammability standards for clothing textiles, posing a risk of burn injuries to consumers.

item.title: Honeywell Recalls Gamewell-FCI and Notifier Photoelectric Smoke Sensors Sold with Fire Alarm Systems Due to Failure to Alert of a Fire
item.description: The photoelectric smoke sensor can malfunction and cause the fire alarm system to fail to alert occupants in commercial buildings of a fire.

item.title: H.E. Industrial Recalls Electric Garage Heaters Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The heating element can overheat, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Hunter Fan Recalls Brunswick Three and Four Light Ceiling Fans Due to Shock Hazard
item.description: The light kit wires can be damaged, posing an electric shock hazard to the consumer.

item.title: Home Meridian Recalls Corner Curio Cabinets Due to Tip-Over and Entrapment Hazards; Sold Exclusively at Havertys (Recall Alert)
item.description: The recalled curio cabinets are unstable if they are not anchored to the wall, posing serious tip-over and entrapment hazards that can result in death or injuries to children.

item.title: American Honda Recalls Recreational Off-Highway Vehicles Due to Crash and Injury Hazards (Recall Alert)
item.description: The throttle pedal can stick in the open position, posing crash and injury hazards.

item.title: Mares Recalls Buoyancy Compensation Vests Due to Drowning Hazard
item.description: The deflation button can come unscrewed and result in loss of buoyancy, posing a drowning hazard.

item.title: Hayward Industries Recalls Pool Heater Vent Kits Due to Carbon Monoxide Poisoning Hazard
item.description: The recalled vent kits installed on gas pool heaters are not the proper size and can allow carbon monoxide to leak, posing a CO poisoning hazard to consumers.

item.title: Amazon Recalls AmazonBasics Ceramic Space Heaters Due to Fire and Burn Hazards (Recall Alert)
item.description: The heater can overheat, posing fire and burn hazards.

item.title: Target Recalls Toddler Boots Due to Choking Hazard
item.description: The unicorn horn on the rain boot can detach, posing a choking hazard to young children.

item.title: Cushy Form Recalls Folding Mattress Due to Violation of Federal Mattress Flammability Standard; Sold Exclusively at Amazon.com (Recall Alert)
item.description: The mattress fails to meet the mandatory federal flammability standard for mattresses, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Xtreme Outdoor Products Recalls Climbing Sticks Due to Fall Hazard and Risk of Serious Injury
item.description: The climbing sticks can break due to a bolt failure on the center step, posing a fall hazard and risk of serious injury.

item.title: Apple Recalls Three-Prong Wall Plug Adapters Included in World Travel Adapter Kit Due to Risk of Electric Shock
item.description: The three-prong AC wall plug adapters can break and expose the metal portion of the adapter, posing an electric shock risk.

item.title: Polaris Recalls Recreational Off Highway Vehicles Due to Crash Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: An incorrectly wired chassis harness can cause an incorrect throttle control signal to the electric drive motor, which can cause the vehicle to accelerate unexpectedly, posing a crash hazard.

item.title: Polaris Recalls RZR Recreational Off-Highway Vehicles Due to Crash and Injury Hazards (Recall Alert)
Generation Brands Recalls Glass Pendant Light Fixtures Due to Risk of Injury
item.description: The small glass pendant light fixtures can detach from their electrical cord, causing the fixture to fall unexpectedly, posing a risk of injury from impact.

item.title: Excel Industries Recalls Zero-Turn Mowers Due to Fire Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: A wire tie underneath the seat could damage the fuel line, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Target Recalls USB Charging Cables Due to Shock and Fire Hazards
item.description: The metal around the cord can become electrically charged if it contacts the USB wall charger plug prongs while charging, posing shock and fire hazards.
